attributes.review: So I was trying to find an app where I could get Obama back into office or figure out where I can get rid of Trump and I found this app and it didn’t do at all what I wanted it to do. Instead it gave me updates on Trump. It was constantly glitchy and lied about how many people were going to his events. Terrible Terrible app please delete this app asap
attributes.title: Remove Trump 2020

attributes.review: I thought Trump was ALL about privacy and security but the first thing they ask if for information to log in??? Why do they need my phone number??? This is outrageous. It immediately opens up to a GIANT Cheeto with little hands fist pumping???? What is going on? I thought these were professionals. Smh par for the course I guess. Anyway I hope you all catch COVID.
attributes.title: Why do they want my information????

attributes.review: This app wants me to my phone number . Does that mean that he will text me bc if he does I’m gonna report him and/or send him memes. I find looking at grass is more interesting then him his kinda funny looking and a.... weird my phone is doing something strange. Also I found a Cheeto on the side of the road just chilling, kinda funny looking tho. It also had some weird hairs growing from it.
attributes.title: ⚠️ WARNING ⚠️

attributes.review: so i opened it to see cheeto man but INSTEAD I SAW HOT CHEETO MAN i was like WAAA (he was kinda hot tho 😏) and then my pet goat gave birth to a dinosaur at that second and the app kept saying i’m so sry for ur loss then the dinosaur ate my otters nuggets and my otter got upset and when he gets upset he acts drunk and they got into a big fight then the app showed an ad of a gravestone that said “trump 2020 😍🥰 but on a gravestone 🧚🏻✨”end of the story they’re on a beanstalk rn DO NOT RECCOMEND THIS APP WHATSOEVER ☹️☹️
attributes.title: wow😍 horrible app 🧚🏻✨

attributes.review: The app in itself is extremely buggy and it literally doesn't work at all. Stole all of my information by doxxing me then came to my house and obliterated it so now Im homeless and Im planning to sue because of this outrageous behavior. I saw this as I was returning from the streets after walking my pet acorvalorvyxanstediaintleopipiinightouseraterdiarriaphemoped. Very disappointed two thumbs down.

i had this app for a solid 30 seconds before my phone completely bugged out on me. now it moves super slow and i keep getting these ads for russian p*rn sites and when i click on it it's just pictures of my feet from when i was a child ☹️ i just wanted to support and respect my president but now i'm getting dms from russian men who are telling me they loved my feet! i also just got a notification that i received a 30 cent payment from commiehub! not only did he sell my childhood feet pics, but he only gave me 30 cents! i will be taking my business elsewhere in the future😡
attributes.title: stole my data and sold it to russia

attributes.review: Downloaded the app trying to support the Trump party. Yet, was utterly disappointed. Because this app gave my iphone a virus I was able to reach the light at the end of the dark tunnel. Realizing what has become of this country. Who would have thought such a narcissistic, homophobic, transphobic, islamphobic, misogynistic and white supremacist could become president!
attributes.title: Will never watch Fox News again!

attributes.review: I have never been so horrified in my life. As I opened the home page I was greeted to a sweaty orange man🤮. As soon as I left the app my home screen and lock screen had a naked Cheeto on them. I cannot breathe right now let alone leave more than a 1 star review on this ill advised app. I’m not one to leave reviews but I wouldn’t wish anyone to see the things that have been shown.
attributes.title: Cheeto man

attributes.review: I download this app too see what it was all about ☺️ when I opened it up I see a picture of a hairy Cheeto that was really orange 😨 I then proceed to delete the app 😡 because who like Donald Trump aka Cheeto man 🥱 anyway I proceeded to my day I went to get up to go take a shower and the hairy cheeto was standing in my shower and attacked me and left Cheeto dust all over me 😐 but luckily I called the police and they took him to jail. Goodbye 😘
attributes.title: Very Scary

attributes.review: I downloaded to think it was helpful but when I first opened it I saw a bald crispy Cheeto getting a spray tan and it made me throw up. I started to criticize it when my front door busted down and it being the fbi. Then the hot Cheeto came through the door and sprayed his tanning stuff on me and my friends. Now I look like a whole Cheeto. Definitely don’t consider downloading. If u do I warn u he’ll come and spray u.🤢🤮
attributes.title: Gross
